author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Order the NexiGo TriVision Ultra at: https://lmg.gg/NexiGoTriVision

The "million-dollar PC" isn't just powerful—it’s practically a space heater. With 9 servers pushing 7-8kW of heat, the LTT server room needed a serious cooling upgrade. The team went from cardboard ducts and salvaged towers to crafting a custom “water door” using old radiators, barbs, and a whole lot of trial and error. Will it leak? Will it work? Let’s find out.

HDPlex 500W GaN Power Supply: https://lmg.gg/5NLaO 
Noctua industrialPPC 3000RPM Fans: https://geni.us/5ynr
Noctua Home Fan Hub: https://lmg.gg/YNos6 
Wago Lever Nuts: https://geni.us/FHWTG5j
Shark Bite 1 Inch Pex Fittings: https://geni.us/YNGlpy
¾ NPT Barb Fittings: https://geni.us/Wcy4SN
¾ NPT Sweat Fittings: https://geni.us/vohlr
¾ NPT Swivel Barb Fittings: https://lmg.gg/5gAdC
